text: also known as Makino Castle was a castle structure in the Sengoku period in Hiki District, Saitama Japan. The site was designated a National Historic Site. The castle was listed as one of the Continued Top 100 Japanese Castles in 2017. ==See also== *List of Historic Sites of Japan (Saitama) == References == Category:Castles in Saitama Prefecture Category:Historic Sites of Japan Category:Former castles in Japan Category:Ruined castles in Japan Category:Uesugi clan Category:Sengoku period
title: Sugiyama Castle
